name: cursor-position-contexts
description: Cursor position contexts for `when` causes of VSCode command keybindings.

cursor-position-contexts.cursorTop.description: `true` if the cursor is at the top of the document

cursor-position-contexts.cursorBottom.description: `true` if the cursor is at the bottom of the document

cursor-position-contexts.cursorHome.description: `true` if the cursor is at the beginning of the line

cursor-position-contexts.cursorEnd.description: `true` if the cursor is at the end of the line

commands.title: Cursor position contexts: Return to a line position that is neither the first nor the last line

scripts.compile: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
